files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+name: build
+description: Set up JDK and run build
+runs:
+  using: "composite"
+  steps:
+    - name: 'Set up JDK'
+      uses: actions/setup-java@v3
+      with:
+       distribution: 'temurin'
+       java-version: 11
+    - name: 'Build JTReg'
+      shell: bash
+      run: bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME}
+    - name: 'Run initial self-tests (goal: quick-test)'
+      env:
+        MAKE_ARGS: quick-test
+        HEADLESS: 1
+      shell: bash
+      run: bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME} --skip-download
+    - name: 'Run all self-tests (goal: test)'
+      if: false
+      env:
+        MAKE_ARGS: test
+        HEADLESS: 1
+      shell: bash
+      run: bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME} --skip-download

@@ -13,1 +13,1 @@
-  linux-x64:
+  linux-test:
@@ -15,1 +15,0 @@
-
@@ -18,3 +17,3 @@
-      uses: actions/checkout@v2
-      with:
-        fetch-depth: 1
+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
+    - name: 'Build'
+      uses: ./.github/actions/build
@@ -22,13 +21,7 @@
-    - name: 'Build JTReg'
-      shell: bash
-      run: |
-        java --version
-        bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME_11_X64}
-
-    - name: 'Run initial tests (goal: quick-test)'
-      shell: bash
-      env:
-        MAKE_ARGS: quick-test
-        HEADLESS: 1
-      run: |
-        bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME_11_X64} --skip-download
+  mac-test:
+    runs-on: macos-latest
+    steps:
+    - name: 'Check out repository'
+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
+    - name: 'Build'
+      uses: ./.github/actions/build
@@ -36,5 +29,12 @@
-    - name: 'Run all tests (goal: test)'
-      shell: bash
-      env:
-        MAKE_ARGS: test
-        HEADLESS: 1
+  windows-test:
+    runs-on: windows-latest
+    defaults:
+      run:
+        shell: C:\cygwin\bin\bash.exe --noprofile --norc -o igncr -eo pipefail '{0}'
+    steps:
+    - name: 'Install Cygwin'
+      uses: cygwin/cygwin-install-action@v2
+      with:
+        packages: >-
+          wget
+    - name: 'Configure Git'
@@ -42,1 +42,6 @@
-        bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME_11_X64} --skip-download
+        git config --global core.autocrlf false
+        git config --global core.eol lf
+    - name: 'Check out repository'
+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
+    - name: 'Build'
+      uses: ./.github/actions/build
